languages.text: "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, трехокий мон-кай, что зрит Ша'эиль, скверна твоих предков начала поглощать твои тело и душу. Ничтожные глупцы, вечно жаждущие чужой силы и власти. Я проявлю милость, избавив вас от страданий".

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Wretched fools who always crave ever-greater power. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Wretched fools who always crave ever-greater power. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, vice of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, vice of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイよ、父祖の非行が、君の身体と魂を喰らい始めた。己のものではない力を渇望してやまない、哀れな愚者よ。君の不幸を終わらせることが慈悲というもの」
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: 「シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイよ、父祖の非行が、君の身体と魂を喰らい始めた。己のものではない力を渇望してやまない、哀れな愚者よ。君の不幸を終わらせることが慈悲というもの」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子啊，你的祖先印下的污点，已经开始反噬你的肉体与灵魂了。你们这些可悲的愚者，总是渴望不属于你们的力量。如今唯一的仁慈，就是结束你的苦难。”
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: “能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子啊，你的祖先犯下的罪行，已经开始反噬你的肉体与灵魂了。你们这些可悲的愚者，总是渴望不属于你们的力量。如今唯一的仁慈，就是结束你的苦难。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil, votre corps et votre esprit sont dévorés par la souillure de vos ancêtres. Des imbéciles guidés par une insatiable soif de pouvoir qui n'est pas la vôtre. Mettre fin à vos souffrances serait faire preuve de miséricorde. »
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: « Mon-keigh à trois yeux qui pouvez voir dans le Sha'eil, votre corps et votre esprit sont dévorés par le vice de vos ancêtres. Des imbéciles guidés par une insatiable soif de pouvoir qui n'est pas la vôtre. Mettre fin à vos souffrances serait faire preuve de miséricorde. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Mon-keigh de tres ojos que ve el Sha'eil, la corrupción de tus ancestros ha comenzado a consumir tu cuerpo y tu alma. Necios patéticos con una sed insaciable de un poder que no os corresponde. Poner fin a vuestra miseria será un acto de clemencia».
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: «Mon-keigh de tres ojos que ve el Sha'eil, las flaquezas de tus ancestros han comenzado a consumir tu cuerpo y tu alma. Necios patéticos con una sed insaciable de un poder que no os corresponde. Poner fin a vuestra miseria será un acto de clemencia».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Dreiäugiger Chem-Pan-Sey, der nach Sha'eil sieht, der Makel Eurer Ahnen hat begonnen, Euren Körper und Eure Seele zu verzehren. Erbärmliche Narren mit einer unstillbaren Gier nach Macht, die nicht die Eure ist. Eurem Leid ein Ende zu setzen, ist ein Akt der Gnade."
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: "Dreiäugiger Chem-Pan-Sey, der nach Sha'eil sieht, das Laster Eurer Ahnen hat begonnen, Euren Körper und Eure Seele zu verzehren. Erbärmliche Narren mit einer unstillbaren Gier nach Macht, die nicht die Eure ist. Eurem Leid ein Ende zu setzen, ist ein Akt der Gnade."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh; atalarının lekesi, vücudunu ve ruhunu tüketmeye başlamış bile. Acınası aptallar sizi, bir başkasının gücüne doymak bilmeden heves etmişsiniz. Bu sefalete son vererek size merhamet etmiş olacağız."
languages.original_text: "Three-eyed mon-keigh who sees into Sha'eil, the taint of your ancestors has begun to consume your body and soul. Pathetic fools with an insatiable lust for power that is not yours. Ending your misery will be merciful."

traits.locale_text: "Sha'eil'i gören üç gözlü mon-keigh; atalarının lekesi, vücudunu ve ruhunu tüketmeye başlamış bile. Acınası aptallar sizi, bir başkasının gücüne doymak bilmeden heves etmişsiniz. Bu sefalete son vererek size merhamet etmiş olacağız."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
